title: Nice one bedroom apartment in Woodbridge
posting_body: This nice one bedroom 3rd floor apartment is located in a well maintained vintage building in the heart of Woodbridge.
It will be available after the 1st week of September.
It has beautifully restored hardwood floors throughout.
There is plenty of storage space which includes 3 closets one of which is a large walk in closet, and a beautifully restored linen closet.
Heat, electricity,  and water are included.
Tenant pays for their own cooking gas.
There is a nice size living room,  kitchen,  bathroom, and bedroom.
Must have good references from previous landlord, a good credit score, and verifiable income.
Move in cost is security deposit which is equal to one month's rent and 1st month's rent.
If interested schedule a viewing and complete an application.
